original_text:
Let the nations be glad and sing for joy,
    for you judge the peoples with equity
    and guide the nations upon earth. Selah
korean_text: 온 백성은 기쁘고 즐겁게 노래할지니 주는 민족들을 공평히 심판하시며 땅 위의 나라들을 다스리실 것임이니이다 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: Let the nations be glad and sing for joy
for you judge the peoples with equity
and guide the nations upon earth
